propertyDescriptor.name: DNABankContainer
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the containerPath to the folder holding the primary data for DNA Bank. Use of slashes is very important - it should be in the format '/myProject/folder'

propertyDescriptor.name: MHCContainer
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the containerPath to the folder holding the primary data for MHC Typing. Use of slashes is very important - it should be in the format '/myProject/folder'

propertyDescriptor.name: ParentageContainer
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the containerPath to the folder holding the primary data for Parentage. Use of slashes is very important - it should be in the format '/myProject/folder'

propertyDescriptor.name: KinshipDataPath
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the filepath of a folder where externally kinship/inbreeding TSVs calculated externally will be deposited. It is used by the KinshipData ETL to initiate import.
